avatar.name: avatar
avatar.long_desc: If the user cannot be found, or no user is given, it shows the avatar of the user who called the command.

help.name: help
help.long_desc: Type .help <command> for more info on a command. If no command is given it gives a general overview of all possible commands.

ping.name: ping
ping.long_desc: Gets time taken between the command being sent and the resulting "pong" message to be sent.

rps.name: rps
rps.long_desc: Replies with its choice and says who, if anyone, won.
